name: autotomize
effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
